name: HugoBoilerplate
description: Useful to help me get new hugo site builds up and running quickly

scripts.start: yarn run build && gulp watch & gulp serve
scripts.build: gulp clean-build && gulp scss && gulp get:tweets && gulp get:comments && hugo && gulp cards && yarn run build:lambda
scripts.build:branch: gulp clean-build && gulp scss && gulp get:comments && hugo && yarn run build:lambda

author: Phil Hawksworth
